in_ports.name: y
in_ports.hint: [Optional] Ignored if skipped (function returns m * x^a)

controls.name: b
controls.description: Note: here and in the previous parameter you can use either a usual real number, or a special string "A / B", where A and B are any real numbers (spaces are ignored). The last form means usual division A/B. It can be convenient, for example, for values like 1/3, that cannot be written exactly as a decimal numbers.
